group_1.narration: And so she told me all about her dream.
The passion she has clearly invested @into that dream was dazzling to me.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, here!@[chara:300101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]This is a design I drew!
Oh!@[chara:300101:motion_100]Thank you so much!
You mean it's at the forefront of @the cutting-edge of fashion, right?!

group_1.textRight: The outfit with hands sprouting from @the back is especially unique...

group_1.textLeft: Those are fungi!
Of course!@Mushrooms!

group_1.textRight: It really is a novel idea.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you sooo much!
But...@I'm still studying my craft...
I'll do my best not to get too@carried away in the early stages!

group_1.textRight: Yes.@Good luck to you in your studies.

group_1.textLeft: For sure!@I'll work super hard!

group_1.textRight: But regarding the Witches...@Please try not to overdo it alone.
Don't go out on your own if your Soul@Gem is especially filled with impurities.

group_1.textLeft: Okay.@[chara:300101:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]I won't do anything risky like I did today.
I'm really sorry for mixing you up in that.@Not only did you help me out...
But you protected me from the Familiars...@Even though I'm a Magical Girl myself...

group_1.textRight: You are a Magical Girl, but you are also@just one girl. Needing help is normal.
Besides, I'm a Magical Girl too.
If nothing else, you can feel at@ease around other Magical Girls.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah…@[chara:300101:motion_0]Thanks...for saying that...
...Oh, that's right!
Could I ask you one last favor?@Seeing as we're the same and all...
This might be kind of blunt to just ask...
But do you have like... any tips or tricks?@For being a Magical Girl.
Because if you do, I'd @love to get some advice!
Please!

group_1.textRight: My first tip is...analyze.@Research different Witch traits.
Keep track of them in a notebook.@Make sure your information is organized.

group_1.textLeft: Ooohhh!
Training!@...[chara:300101:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_000.exp.json]Seriously?

group_1.textRight: In order to unlock its true potential...@It takes special training and practice.
It may seem like the long route, but good@practice is actually a shortcut to success.

group_1.textLeft: Okay, yeah…@Thanks so much!
This is my first time meeting@[chara:300101:motion_200]someone as strong as you are!

group_1.textRight: All I did was slowly but surely hone @my skills.

group_1.textLeft: That makes sense...@Slow and steady, one step at a time...
Just as I thought...@That's the best way to do anything, huh.
What is it?!@[chara:300101:motion_100]Please tell me!
